Label: Obligation
Format: Mandatory - used to generate citations; critical for GeoBlacklight functioning

Label: Purpose
Format: To display to the user the name of the file type as a text string in the download button.

Label: Entry Guidelines
Format: Enter a string describing the file format, preferably from the list of [Format Values](../ogm-aardvark/#format-values).

Label: Commentary
Format: This field is required if the download URL (`http://schema.org/downloadUrl`) in the [References](../ogm-aardvark/#references) field is configured as a single key:value pair. The field is not required if using the [multiple downloads](../configure-references-links/#multiple-downloads) option.
